title: Hextech Repair Tool ping results
body: So I downloaded the hextech repair tool and accoding to it I have 51ms latency. However when I hop into a game I have about 100. I am on the appropriate server, so I see no reason for there to be such a difference between the two.  Feel free to offer any solution/comment on this.

replies.body: This might be a connection issue like packet loss, or how your ISP might be reaching the game server.  Grab some network logs with the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to grab some more info on what's going on.  Let me know the results, and we'll go from there.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EenwXjm2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-10T22:36:41.938+0000)
>
> This might be a connection issue like packet loss, or how your ISP might be reaching the game server.  Grab some network logs with the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to grab some more info on what's going on.  Let me know the results, and we'll go from there.

According to the log reader my average percentage of packet loss is 0,08 in one game and 0,1 in another, while my ping doesn't fluctuate.

Thanks!  In this case I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  This will help towards resolving the packet loss, and configuring your dns may change how your you're routing to us with the fastest way.  Hope that helps!
